body.name: Air Purifiers for Bedroom Home, EXECCZO H13 True HEPA Filter Air Purifiers for Desktop Office Car Pets with USB Cable, Small Air Cleaner to Pure Smoke Dust Odors and Pet Dander
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 30 mins
features: - PORTABLE AND COMPACT: This small air purifier is compact in size, making it easy to move around and perfect for use in bedrooms, offices, cars, and other small spaces.
- EFFICIENT AIR PURIFICATION: Equipped with a true H13 HEPA filter, this air purifier effectively captures 99.97% of air particles, including smoke, dust, odors, pet dander, and more.
- VERSATILE USE: With its USB cable, this air purifier can be conveniently powered by a computer, power bank, or car charger, allowing you to use it anywhere, anytime.

- IMPROVE YOUR INDOOR AIR QUALITY: This H13 small air purifier is designed to give you cleaner and fresher air, helping to reduce allergies, improve sleep quality, and create a healthier living environment.
-WHAT YOU GET: a portable air purifier, 3-in-1 filter, DC to USB charging cable (the plug is not included), and a instruction manual. 1-year warranty and 24 hours technology support are provided.

reviews.reviewerName: James and Amy ReviewsJames and Amy Reviews
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Well, Steady Humming Sound, Easy to Use, Great Filter
reviews.reviewText: The Execczo air filter is simple to use. It has a good filter system. It does have a steady humming sound when in use. This is working well in my 8x11 office area. It has a clean streamlined look and looks good with my decor. There is only one button for power and filter speed. This is ready to use in minutes with no fuss. It is lightweight for easy packing, and it would be great in a dorm room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I guess it's working?
reviews.reviewText: To be honest I'm not really sure whether this is working effectively or not. I guess I probably won't know just how much it's filtered out of the air until I change the filter, and I'm not sure exactly when I should do that. My house has so much pet hair and dust (especially in the winter when we burn wood and the smoke and ash causes extra dust) that I'm guessing I should change it more often than the average household. The room I put this in is a bedroom, but it's not exactly a small room - it used to be two rooms before a wall was knocked out and they were combined into one. Also I wasn't sure about positioning - I've got it on a nightstand right next to my bed, but I'm not sure that's the best idea, since I don't want it pulling all the dust and allergens over in my direction. I haven't noticed much difference in my congestion level while sleeping when I've been running the purifier, but since some nights are always worse than others it's hard to judge. I do like the noise it makes, since it's very soft and steady, like a white noise machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 other much larger air purifiers and this one is noisier than either one of those... even on it's lowest setting. It reminds me of one of those sound machines they put outside therapists doors or the sleep ones or something. Plus, there are no instructions to tell you about which filter to use to replace it so I guess they expect it to be one-time use. I would not buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No indication of what replacement filters to use. Even the low setting is pretty noisy.
reviews.reviewText: I asked what filters to use for replacements, and got no response. So, as is, this is a one time use product. (3 months or so.)Also, the directions are fairly poor quality, and don't even show what direction to put the filter in. (Though maybe it doesn't matter?) Oh, and make sure if you do have one of these, that the filter is still in a package, inside the machine, so you need to remove it, take the packaging off, and reinsert it before using the machine. (At least the instructions do mention this.)...Key to ratings:***** - well above average - best I’ve seen**** - above average - very good quality*** - average - not bad, not great** - below average - I probably wish I'd gotten something different* - a waste of resources - I wish this had never been made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works great at removing dust particles from the air helping you to sleep better at night. I only use this at bedtime and it's been a life saver! It's small and quiet so much so that I forget it's on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny bit powerful
reviews.reviewText: This purifier is tiny, but surprisingly powerful. It has 3 strong settings. It's a bit noisy but it's not unbearable. Works very well. Cute little filter is easy to replace. Overall a really nice, affordable air purifier for small areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3 speeds and Low Sound Volume
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. In the video you can hear the sound volume as the speeds change. There are three intervals:Low: suggested for night timeMedium: suggested for daytime useHigh: suggested for quick purificationYou hit the power button once to change each speed. Hitting a fourth time will turn the purifier off. With the small size, this will work in a smaller room best.It doesn’t take up a lot of space and I use it in my laundry room where I temporarily have the cats. A wallflower helped but scent mixed with cat after a while and I needed something just a little extra.No batteries or charging required you plug into the wall. Please note the wall plug in is NOT included only comes with the USB cable. However, any standard box will do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This isn't that large at all but pretty effective and that's what matters the most. Not noisy at all and doesn't take up a lot of space. Easy setup and very good at removing all kinds of odors.
